string.name: title_schedule
string.translation_description: The title for the schedule screen where user can see their schedule for Google I/O.

string.name: title_home
string.translation_description: The title for the Home screen where user can all the updates from Google I/O team.

string.name: title_map
string.translation_description: The title for the map screen where user can see the map of the venue.

string.name: title_explore_io
string.translation_description: The title for the Augmented reality exploration screen where the user can explore the I/O venue in AR.

string.name: title_info
string.translation_description: The title for the info screen where user can see various information, such as FAQ and travel info.

string.name: a11y_photo_item_image
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for each of the photo images shown in the 'My Gallery' and 'Photo list' screens.

string.name: gallery_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the clickable image to navigate to the gallery screen

string.name: menu_item_share_photo
string.translation_description: The label for the Share menu item

string.name: menu_filter_by_grow_zone
string.translation_description: The label for the menu item to filter the displayed plants by grow zone.

string.name: feature_detail_image_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the header / hero image that is show at the top of the photo detail screen.

string.name: write_empty
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on the 'Home Photo' screen when no writes have been added to the user's Gallery

string.name: add_photo
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to the Photo List to add photos to their empty Gallery.

string.name: image_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the header / hero image that is show at the top of the home photo screen.

string.name: menu_submit
string.translation_description: The label for the menu item to submit

string.name: a11y_show_navigation
string.translation_description: Description of the menu button shown on top-level screens.

string.name: agenda
string.translation_description: The title for the agenda screen where user can see all the sessions they plan to attend.

string.name: codelabs_building
string.translation_description: Text of a button that shows where the Codelabs building is on the map.

string.name: codelabs_website
string.translation_description: Text of a button that launches the Codelabs website.

string.name: event_codelabs_title
string.translation_description: Header label for general information on "codelabs".

string.name: event_sessions_title
string.translation_description: Header label for general information on "sessions".

string.name: event_sessions_description
string.translation_description: General information on sessions

resources.string: Starting in April, in-person attendees can reserve seats for Sessions in advance of the event on the I/O website and also via the I/O mobile app (note: a portion of Session seats will be exempt from reservations and available first-come, first-served onsite). Attendance at Codelabs, App Reviews, and Office Hours is on a first-come, first-served basis onsite.

string.name: view_sessions_text
string.translation_description: Link label for viewing all sessions in schedule.

string.name: onboarding_get_started
string.translation_description: The label for the button to start using the app.

string.name: onboarding_welcome_to_google_i_o
string.translation_description: The welcome message shown at the onboarding screen of the app.

string.name: onboarding_date_location
string.translation_description: The date and the place of Google I/O 2019. [CHAR_LIMIT=80]

string.name: onboarding_label_days
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of days until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_hours
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of hours until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_mins
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of minutes until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_seconds
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of seconds until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_welcome_google_io_pre
string.translation_description: The welcome message shown before the conference to tell that Google I/O is coming

string.name: onboarding_welcome_google_io_during
string.translation_description: The welcome message shown during the conference

string.name: onboarding_welcome_google_io_post
string.translation_description: The welcome message shown post the conference

resources.string: Watch the I/O \'19 recap and check out #io19 on social

string.name: onboarding_signin
string.translation_description: The welcome message to encourage the user to sign-in to have better experience

resources.string: Sign-in to receive I/O notifications and attendees can reserve seats for sessions.

item.translation_description: Unit for duration of time by days. Singular.
Unit for duration of time by days. Plural.
Unit for duration of time by hours. Singular.
Unit for duration of time by hours. Plural.
Unit for duration of time by minutes. Singular.
Unit for duration of time by minutes. Plural.
Unit for duration of time by seconds. Singular.
Unit for duration of time by seconds. Plural.

string.name: expanded
string.translation_description: The label used on a button when a view is in an expanded state.

string.name: collapsed
string.translation_description: The label used on a button when a view is in an collapsed state.

string.name: travel_shuttle_service_title
string.translation_description: Header label for Shuttle service for travel

string.name: travel_shuttle_service_description
string.translation_description: Information on getting to Shoreline Amphitheater travel

resources.string: Free event shuttles from all Google recommended hotels will be provided for Google I/O attendees. There will also be select service from San Francisco, Millbrae BART, Mountain View Caltrain, San Jose, and Oakland. We are increasing the shuttle frequency and capacity at the Mountain View Caltrain and Millbrae Bart stations. Check back closer to the event for pick-up schedules and additional shuttle pickup locations. The Shuttle Schedule will be posted closer to the event.

string.name: codelabs_information
string.translation_description: Information about codelabs.

resources.string: Learn about the latest and greatest Google technologies via self-paced tutorials in our ready-to-code kiosks, or bring your own machine and take your work home with you. Kiosks are open daily except during the first Keynote.

string.name: codelab_duration
string.translation_description: Text showing the approximate time in minutes that a user would spend during a codelab tutorial. Abbreviated.

string.name: start_codelab
string.translation_description: Text of a button that allows a user to start a codelab tutorial.

string.name: settings_title
string.translation_description: Title for the tab that shows all the settings of this app.

string.name: version_name
string.translation_description: Label for the app version name in Settings.

string.name: about_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'About' tab that shows miscellaneous info.

string.name: settings_time_zone_label
string.translate_description: Set time zone in app to PST.

string.name: settings_send_anonymous_usage_statistics
string.translation_description: Enable sending usage statistics.

string.name: settings_tos
string.translation_description: Open link to terms of service.

string.name: settings_privacy_policy
string.translation_description: Open link to privacy policy.

string.name: settings_oss_licenses
string.translation_description: Open link to open source licenses.

string.name: settings_theme_title
string.translation_description: Choose the app theme

string.name: settings_theme_system
string.translation_description: Theme option to use the system default

string.name: settings_theme_light
string.translation_description: Theme option to use the light theme

string.name: settings_theme_dark
string.translation_description: Theme option to use the dark theme

string.name: settings_theme_battery
string.translation_description: Theme option to use which is set by the device Battery Saver feature being enabled

string.name: built_with_material_components
string.translation_description: The app was built with Material Components.

string.name: a11y_star
string.translation_description: Alternate text for a button used for starring or unstarring events

string.name: schedule_filters_empty
string.translation_description: The message shown when a schedule page is empty because no events match the current filters.
